name: SkyDiver - An Addictive Game
description:
Parachute your way through targets as the ground gets ever closer.

Get your own parachute to jump off your plane and move your skydiver to the right targets.

The closer your get in the middle of the targets the more point you will get.

SkyDiver is a great pick up and play game especially for children which will test their reaction and attentiveness, as well as help to improve their hand-eye coordination.

Don't forget to pull out your parachute!
